if.test: maint_accpt_ymd_start != null and maint_accpt_ymd_start != '' and maint_accpt_ymd_end != null and maint_accpt_ymd_end != ''
maint_str_ymd_start != null and maint_str_ymd_start != '' and maint_str_ymd_end != null and maint_str_ymd_end != ''
maint_end_ymd_start != null and maint_end_ymd_start != '' and maint_end_ymd_end != null and maint_end_ymd_end != ''
reg_dt_start != null and reg_dt_start != '' and reg_dt_end != null and reg_dt_end != ''

sql.if: and tmd.reg_dt::timestamp between concat(#{reg_dt_start},' 00:00:00')::timestamp and concat(#{reg_dt_end},' 23:59:59')::timestamp

mapper.select:
SELECT tmd.mgnt_no , tst.sens_tp_nm , tst.senstype_no , TO_CHAR(tmd.maint_accpt_ymd::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS maint_accpt_ymd , TO_CHAR(tmd.maint_str_ymd::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS maint_str_ymd , TO_CHAR(tmd.maint_end_ymd::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS maint_end_ymd , tmd.district_no , tdi.district_nm , tmd.sens_no , tsi.sens_nm , tmd.maint_rslt_cd , tcc.code_nm , tmd.maint_dtls , tmd.maint_comp_nm , tmd.maint_chgr_nm , tmd.maint_chgr_ph , tmd.maint_pic_path1 , tmd.maint_pic_path2 , tmd.maint_pic_path3 , tmd.maint_pic_path4 , tmd.reg_dt , tmd.mod_dt FROM tb_maint_details tmd LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_district_info tdi ON tmd.district_no = tdi.district_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_sensor_info tsi ON tmd.sens_no = tsi.sens_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_common_code tcc ON tmd.maint_rslt_cd = tcc.code_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_sensor_type tst ON tsi.senstype_no = tst.senstype_no WHERE 1=1
limit #{rows}::int offset (#{page}::int - 1) * #{rows}::int

SELECT count(tmd.mgnt_no) FROM tb_maint_details tmd LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_district_info tdi ON tmd.district_no = tdi.district_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_sensor_info tsi ON tmd.sens_no = tsi.sens_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_common_code tcc ON tmd.maint_rslt_cd = tcc.code_id WHERE 1 = 1
